thread.title: How Trump's steel tariffs kick the can business

title: How Trump's steel tariffs kick the can business
text:
How Trump's steel tariffs kick the can business 10:15am BST - 01:39
The Trump administration's tariffs on steel and aluminum are having a ripple effect throughout the U.S. economy, from cars to aircraft to oilfield pipes. But cans have a special significance in the debate over the pros and cons of the administration's policy. Rough Cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
